Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Agreed across all process variants
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities

Name: Percentage of process variants in which SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs at least once
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases

Name: Number of times SW-Reviewer Agreed is followed by SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed occurrences that are preceded by SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Ratio of SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Reviewer Declined in the entire event log
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed activities that eventually lead to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Agreed per case (manuscript submission)
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-Reviewer Agreed appears more than once
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed relative to the total number of activity executions in the log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Agreed compared to RW-Reviewer Agreed in revised manuscript phases
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities for cases where activity 'RW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Agreed events that occur before any SW-AE Recommendation overdue notification
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Recommendation overdue' does not occur

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed activities that occur within 7 days of the initial SW-AE Assign Reviewers action
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Agreed events that occur without any prior SW-Reviewer Declined or SW-Reviewer Unavailable in the same case
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants that end with an acceptance decision (e.g., SW-EIC Accept, RW-EIC Accept)
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Agreed events that directly follow SW-Reviewer Selection is now due or SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities

Name: Ratio of SW-Reviewer Agreed to the sum of all negative reviewer responses (SW-Reviewer Declined + SW-Reviewer Unavailable + SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed out of all reviewer-related activities (e.g., SW-Reviewer Declined, SW-Reviewer Unavailable, SW-Reviewer No Response)

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed occurrences that appear after a Reviewer Invitation Reminder (either 1 or 2)
